title: How to Make a Duct Tape Strap

steps.headline: Cut a strip of duct tape to whatever length you want.
Fold a third of it (long ways) over sticky side-to-sticky side.
steps.description: You should now have a "bar" of not sticky duct tape.

steps.headline: Fold the non sticky area over again.
steps.description: This should make a thicker "bar" of non-sticky duct tape.

steps.headline: Bend the duct tape strip until it forms a duct tape strap.

text: Cut a strip of duct tape to whatever length you want.  Fold a third of it (long ways) over sticky side-to-sticky side. You should now have a "bar" of not sticky duct tape. Fold the non sticky area over again. This should make a thicker "bar" of non-sticky duct tape. Bend the duct tape strip until it forms a duct tape strap.
